properties.description:
Monthly coffee morning - hot drinks, cakes, magazines, friendly group.
Wednesday to Saturday each week - free to enter exhibition with places to sit and explore our collection and reference books.
No charge, donations welcome.

hours._text:
Coffee morning - last Monday of the month
Exhibition - Wednesday to Saturday 11:00 - 15:00 (please check website to confirm)
